headline: Ask HN: Did you know that your brain reads faster than your eye?
description:
Hi HN community

I’m new here and hope you forgive me if I didn’t choose the right HN channel.

I am looking for interested people who would like to integrate the reading mode Bionic Reading as API into their apps or services. The beta API is expected to be ready by the end of April.

The prototype of Bionic Reading so far is already available in 3 RSS apps. In “Reeder 4+5”, in “Fiery Feeds” and in “Lire”.

Now I want to make the reading mode available to as many people as possible. Moms and dads, students, CEOs, people with dyslexia and many more write to me. And also many who can read even faster with Bionic Reading than before.

If you are interested, please sign up on the website. https://bionic-reading.com

I would be happy if BR is in your app or service and so many people can be helped.

Best regards from the Swiss Alps. Renato
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 你知道吗，你的大脑比你的眼睛读得更快？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 你知道嗎，你的大腦比你的眼睛讀得更快？
description_zh-Hans:
嗨，HN社区

我是新来的，如果我没有选择正确的HN频道，希望你能原谅我。

我正在寻找有兴趣的人，希望将阅读模式Bionic Reading作为API整合到他们的应用程序或服务中。测试版API预计将在4月底前完成。

到目前为止，仿生阅读的原型已经在3个RSS应用程序中使用。在 "Reeder 4+5"、"Fiery Feeds "和 "Lire "中。

现在，我想让尽可能多的人都能使用阅读模式。爸爸妈妈、学生、CEO、有阅读障碍的人以及更多的人给我写信。还有很多人通过仿生阅读可以比以前读得更快。

如果你有兴趣，请在网站上注册。 https://bionic-reading.com

如果BR在你的应用程序或服务中，这么多人可以得到帮助，我将非常高兴。

来自瑞士阿尔卑斯山的问候。雷纳托
